basic_stats.description: Средние значения времени ответа по количеству клиентов
basic_stats.query: SELECT server_type, clients_total, ROUND(AVG(t_send_success), 6), ROUND(AVG(t_response), 6) FROM test GROUP BY clients_total, server_type

raw_stats.query: SELECT server_type, clients_total, t_send_success, t_response FROM test WHERE t_send_success IS NOT NULL AND t_response IS NOT NULL ORDER BY server_type, clients_total

server_errors.query: SELECT * FROM server_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC
